text: [Ej pajomʙar, ʙa jod ovar] hangome ki guruhe az cinro suji tu firistodem, ki Qur'onro ʙisunavand, pas, cun nazdi pajomʙar huzur joftand, [ʙa jakdigar] guftand: «Xomus ʙosed [to ʙa ojoti Qur'on gus faro dihem] va cun [tilovatas] ʙa pojon rasid, nazdi qavmi xud ʙozgastand, to ʙa onon [dar mavridi avoqiʙi sarpeci az farmoni haq] husdor dihand
